name: Extensible TreeGraph File
summary: Learn about .XTG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XTG files are used for storing structured bioinformatics data. The phylogenetic trees, also called evolutionary trees, are commonly used to study the genetic relationships between biological species.
NOTE: TreeGraph was published in the BMC Bioinformatics journal. The software was developed in Java and requires version 1.6.0 of the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

description: File created by TreeGraph 2, a program used to build and annotate phylogenetic trees; stores a phylogenetic tree in the XML-based Extensible TreeGraph (XTG) format; includes annotations and formatting information.
